name: PaperMate Red InkJoy Ballpoint Pen
description: Smooth-writing ballpoint pen with vibrant red ink, perfect for everyday writing tasks and note-taking.

name: Faber-Castell Blue Text Marker
description: Professional-grade text marker with chisel tip for precise highlighting and underlining in blue.

name: Staples 30cm Plastic Ruler
description: Durable plastic ruler with clear markings in centimeters and inches, ideal for drawing straight lines and measuring.

name: Staples A5 Spiral Notebook
description: 80-page spiral-bound notebook with lined pages, perfect for taking notes, sketching, and journaling.

name: Faber-Castell Black Permanent Marker
description: Waterproof permanent marker with bullet tip, ideal for labeling, art projects, and outdoor use.

name: Faber-Castell Desktop Stapler
description: Heavy-duty desktop stapler that can staple up to 25 sheets, with built-in staple remover and non-slip base.

name: Pilot A4 Hardcover Sketchbook
description: Premium sketchbook with thick paper suitable for pencils, charcoal, and light watercolors.

name: Bic White Vinyl Eraser
description: Soft vinyl eraser that cleanly removes pencil marks without tearing paper or leaving residue.

name: Bic Mini Stapler
description: Compact portable stapler perfect for on-the-go use, comes with built-in staple storage.

name: PaperMate Composition Notebook
description: Classic wide-ruled composition book with marble cover, 100 sheets for school and office use.

name: Faber-Castell Red Felt-Tip Marker
description: Washable felt-tip marker with vibrant red ink, perfect for coloring, drawing, and crafts.

name: Bic Glue Stick 21g
description: Non-toxic, washable glue stick that goes on purple and dries clear for easy application control.

name: PaperMate Green Highlighter
description: Fluorescent green highlighter with chisel tip for broad highlighting and fine underlining.

name: PaperMate Photo-Safe Glue Stick
description: Acid-free glue stick safe for photos and important documents, with smooth application.

name: Pilot G2 Gel Pen Set (5-Pack)
description: Set of 5 retractable gel pens with smooth gel ink in assorted colors, perfect for everyday writing.

name: Faber-Castell Green Textliner
description: Water-based highlighter with broad chisel tip, smudge-proof on inkjet prints and copies.

name: Staples Fine Point Marker
description: Precision fine-point marker for detailed work, labeling, and technical drawing applications.

name: Faber-Castell Metal Edge Ruler
description: Professional metal ruler with beveled edge for precise cutting and measuring, 30cm length.

name: Pilot Craft Glue Stick
description: Strong adhesive glue stick for paper, cardboard, and fabric crafts, with easy twist-up application.

name: Pilot Heavy-Duty Stapler
description: Professional stapler capable of stapling up to 40 sheets, with adjustable paper guide.
